title: ACCOUNTING
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes chosen from Economics, Accounting, Business Management, Government and Geography.
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes including English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any other two (2) other subjects.

For NBC holders, the other two (2) relevant subjects could be from any of Principles of Accounts, Commerce, Office Practice and Secretarial Duties.�
subjects: Mathematics, Economics plus any Social Science subject.

title: ADULT EDUCATION
de_requirements:
(i)    Two (2) 'A' Level   passes.

(ii)           NCE merit in two (2) subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes including English Language, Mathematics and three (3) of Literature in English, History, French, Yoruba, Igbo, Hausa, Christian Religious Studies, Islamic Studies, Geography/Physic, Economics and Government or TC II with pass in English Language and four (4) other subjects.
subjects: Government/History, one (1) Social Science subject and any other subject.

title: AGRICULTURE
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes in Chemistry and one from Biology/Botany/Zoology/Agricultural Science, Economics, Physics, Geography and Geology/Mathematics (Pure & Applied).
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language, Biology/Agricultural Science, Chemistry and  any one of Mathematics, Physics, Geography and  Economics.
subjects: Chemistry, Biology/Agriculture and any one of Physics or Mathematics.

title: ARCHITECTURE
de_requirements: Candidates who fulfill the UTME Entry requirement above should have obtained G.C.E. Advanced level, H.S.C./IJMB or equivalent with passes in Mathematics and Physics, or Mathematics or Physics and any other subject noted above may be admitted into the 200-level of the programme. A candidate who fulfills normal admission requirement and in addition holds and ND and HND certificate in Architecture or Allied Subject at Credit Level can be considered for admission into the programme at the appropriate level
utme_requirements: Candidates who have successfully completed the Senior Secondary School or its equivalent, obtained five credit in English, Mathematics, Physics and two other subject from the following list will be eligible for admission: Chemistry, Biology, Technical Drawing, Fine Arts, Geography Economics, Building Construction and Land Surveying.
subjects: English Language, Mathematics, Physics and any one of Chemistry, Geography, Technical Drawing, fine Arts, Geography or Economics

title: ARCHITECTURE
de_requirements:
(i)       Two (2) 'A' Level passes chosen from Mathematics or Physics and Chemistry, Geography or Fine Arts.

(ii)   ND/HND upper credits in relevant field.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and any of Fine Art, Geography or Wood Work, Biology, Economics, Technical Drawing, Further. Mathematics., Introduction to Building Construction, Bricklaying/Block laying, Concreting, Wall, Floors and Ceiling Finishing, Joinery, Carpentary, Decorative Painting, Lining, Sign and Design, Wall Hanging, Colour Mixing/Matching and Glazing, Ceramics, Graphics Design, Graphic Printing, Basic Electricity.
subjects: Physics, Mathematics, and any of Chemistry, Geography, Art, Biology and Economics.

title: ARCHITECTURE
de_requirements:
(i)       Two (2) 'A' Level passes chosen from Mathematics or Physics and Chemistry, Geography or Fine Arts.

ND/HND upper credits in relevant field.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and any of Fine Art, Geography or Wood Work, Biology, Economics, Technical Drawing, Further. Mathematics., Introduction to Building Construction, Bricklaying/Block laying, Concreting, Wall, Floors and Ceiling Finishing, Joinery, Carpentary, Decorative Painting, Lining, Sign and Design, Wall Hanging, Colour Mixing/Matching and Glazing, Ceramics, Graphics Design, Graphic Printing, Basic Electricity.
subjects: Physics, Mathematics, and any of Chemistry, Geography, Art, Biology and Economics.

title: BANKING & FINANCE
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes chosen from Accounting, Economics, Management, Mathematics, Geography and Statistics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include: English Language, Mathematics and any other subjects. For NBC, the other two (2) relevant subjects could be from any of the following; Accounting, Principles of Accounts, Commerce, Office Practice and Economics.
subjects: English Language, Mathematics, Economics, and any of the following subject: Geography, Government, Commerce, Principles of Accounts, Literature in English, Civic Education and Christian Religious knowledge (CRK) / IRS.

Two (2) 'A' Level passes chosen from Chemistry, Mathematics, Physics and Biology.

 

NCE/ND/HND in related programmes plus the UTME requirements.

subjects: Biology, Chemistry and Physics or Mathematics.

utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including English Language, Mathematics, Economics, plus any two (2) of Accounting, Business Methods, Commerce, Government, Geography, and Statistics.
subjects: Mathematics, Economics and one (1) other subject.

Mathematics, Economics/
Commerce plus one (1) of Chemistry/Physics/Biology

)       Two (2) 'A' Level passes in science subjects including Mathematics

title: ESTATE MANAGEMENT

title: HEALTH EDUCATION
de_requirements:
i)  Two (2) 'A' Level passes in any of Biology, Chemistry, Physics and Mathematics.

 

(ii)  NCE merit in Physical Education and credit in Arithmetical process or Mathematics.

 

(iii)  Diploma in Health Education, Environmental Sanitation, Physical Education, Social work, Health Administration with overall grades of merit plus three (3) 'O' Level credit passes/TC II merit which should include English Language.

 

(iv) NCE in Biology, Health Education, and Integrated Science with a pass grade plus two (2) 'O' Level credit passes/TC II merit passes.

 

(v)    Registered Nurse plus five (5) 'O' Level credit passes to include English Language.
utme_requirements:
i) Five (5) SSC credit passes/TC II merit passes including     English Language, Biology or its equivalent.

 

ii) Five (5) SSC credit passes/TC II merit passes to include English Language and Mathematics.
subjects: Biology and any two (2) relevant subjects.

title: SURVEYING & GEOINFORMATICS
de_requirements:
In Addition to fulfilling the UTME Entry requirement above candidate with the following qualifications may be admitted into a four-year programme

i) Candidate who have passes in Mathematics and Physics at the G.C.E. (A/Level) or its equivalent and have in addition, three other credit passes in SSCE or GCE (O/Level) or its equivalent.

ii) Holders of the Ordinary National Diploma (OND) in Surveying and related field from a NBTE accredited Institution.
utme_requirements: Five (5) credit in SSCE/GCE including English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any other two subjects from Chemistry, Physics, Geography, Biology, Agricultural Science and Technical Drawing.
subjects: Mathematics, Physics and any one of Chemistry or Geography

title: SURVEYING AND  GEO-INFORMATICS
de_requirements:
(i) Two (2) 'A' Level passes chosen from Mathematics or Physics and Chemistry, Geography or Fine Arts.

(ii) ND/HND upper credits in relevant field.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and any of Fine Art, Geography or Wood Work, Biology, Economics, Technical Drawing, Further. Mathematics., Introduction to Building Construction, Bricklaying/Block laying, Concreting, Wall, Floors and Ceiling Finishing, Joinery, Carpentary, Decorative Painting, Lining, Sign and Design, Wall Hanging, Colour Mixing/Matching and Glazing, Ceramics, Graphics Design, Graphic Printing, Basic Electricity.
subjects: Physics, Mathematics, and any of Chemistry, Geography, Art, Biology and Economics.

title: TEACHER EDUCATION SCIENCE:
de_requirements:
(i)  Two (2) 'A' Level passes in relevant teaching subjects including Literature in English.

(ii)  NCE credit or merit in two(2)relevant subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes to include English Language and Literature in English plus three (3) other Arts or Social Science subjects.
subjects: Literature in English and one (1) Art and any other subject.

title: TECHNICAL EDUCATION

(i)     NCE merit in two (2) relevant Science subjects plus the UTME requirements.

 

(ii)    Two 'A' Level passes in Physics, Mathematics and Chemistry.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes in relevant subjects which must include English Language and Mathematics or NTC/NBC.
subjects: Physics, Mathematics, Chemistry.

title: TRANSPORT & PLANNING
de_requirements: Two (2)'A' Level passes including Economics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including English Language, Mathematics, Economics and two (2) other relevant subjects.
subjects: Mathematics, Economics and any other Social Science subject

title: URBAN & REGIONAL PLANNING
de_requirements:
In addition to the UTME Entry requirement, holders of Higher School Certificate (HSC)/ GCE A' Level two subject including Geography and one subject from the following: Mathematics, Economics, Biology, Physics, Chemistry, Technical Drawing and Fine Arts.

Holder of National Diploma (ND) in the field relevant to Environmental Science or similar qualifications can be considered for direct entry admission, provided they satisfy the conditions above and of which the candidate's score is NOT less than 60% average (upper credit) equivalent.
utme_requirements: To be eligible for admission, candidate must have Five (5) credit in SSCE or its equivalent in English Language, Mathematics, Geography and any two other subject from Economics, Biology, Physics, Chemistry, Technical Drawing and Fine Arts or Government.
subjects: Mathematics and any two other subject from Geography, Economics, Physics, Biology, Chemistry, Technical Drawing, Fine Arts and Government

title: URBAN AND REGIONAL PLANNING:
de_requirements:
(i)      Two (2) A’ LEVEL passes in Geography and Mathematics

(ii)     ND/HND upper credit in Town Planning or related programmes plus UTME requirements are accepted.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Geography, and any two (2) of Physics, Chemistry, Economics, Government, Biology, Art, History, IRK/CRK, Social Studies and Tech Drawing.
subjects: Mathematics, Geography and one of Economics, Physics, Chemistry.

title: YORUBA
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes to include Yoruba or Literature in English.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include Yoruba and English Language.
subjects: Yoruba and two (2) other subjects in Arts or Social Sciences
